title: kaNDu piDittEnammA
sahitya:
kaNDu piDittEnammA en kaNNanaik-


anupallavi

  aNDaiyilE irundu koNDE mayakki ennai alaiyaviTTa antaryAmiyai aruLinAl


caraNam    kalaiyilum shilaiyilum kaTTuk-kathaiyilum ghana dhana vAzhvilum manadilum tEDinEn
valaiyinai vIsinAl vAna mIn sikkumO vanjamil anbuLLa nenjilE pughundu nAn
